# mBytesPerPacket

**Instance Property**

The number of bytes in a packet of audio data.

## Declaration

```swift
var mBytesPerPacket: UInt32
```

## Discussion

To indicate variable packet size, set this field to `0`. For a format that uses variable packet size, specify the size of each packet using an [doc://com.apple.coreaudiotypes/documentation/CoreAudioTypes/AudioStreamPacketDescription] structure.

## Inspecting a description

- **mFormatID**: An identifier specifying the general audio data format in the stream.
- **mFormatFlags**: Format-specific flags to specify details of the format.
- **mSampleRate**: The number of frames per second of the data in the stream, when playing the stream at normal speed.
- **mBitsPerChannel**: The number of bits for one audio sample.
- **mBytesPerFrame**: The number of bytes from the start of one frame to the start of the next frame in an audio buffer.
- **mChannelsPerFrame**: The number of channels in each frame of audio data.
- **mFramesPerPacket**: The number of frames in a packet of audio data.
- **mReserved**: The amount to pad the structure to force an even 8-byte alignment.
